los_angeles_mehko.title: Los Angeles MEHKO
los_angeles_mehko.description: Apply for a Microenterprise Home Kitchen Operation permit in Los Angeles County (excluding Pasadena, Long Beach, and Vernon).
notes: Excludes Pasadena, Long Beach, and Vernon
Must submit a sample menu and SOP with the application

sandiego_mehko.title: San Diego County MEHKO
sandiego_mehko.description: San Diego MEHKO program. Up to 30 meals/day (90/week) and $100,000 gross sales cap; with approved pushcarts: 80/day (200/week) and $150,000 cap.
notes: Up to 30 meals/day (90/week) and $100,000 gross sales cap
Same-day service only - no leftovers to next day
Must operate from primary residence only
